name: Electric Stun Gun Fake
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Stun Gun.
Electric Stun Gun Fake
Electric stun gun Fake - this is a game simulation of a joke, where you can play on your phone with both electroshock gun. The game uses a camera for a more realistic effect! Play with your friends!
Attention stun gun only simulator and will not harm your health!
Make fun and play your family and friends!
Thank you for playing our applications! Leave reviews applications and we will make them even more interesting!
